location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 25/12 'Orders in Council: Persian Coast and Islands: Reports on working of'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the back to the front.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 73; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Annual reports (1915-1927) on the working of The Persian Coast and Islands Order in Council, sent by the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf to the Government of India, Foreign and Political Department, and the India Office. The reports contain information on jurisdiction, civil and criminal cases tried in each area, and registration of British subjects and protected persons.

name.namePart: Government of India, Foreign and Political Department

subject.topic: Persian Coast and Islands Order in Council
